name: places/ChIJdfqikj1ZwokRRMVwDYENiJs
formattedAddress: 153 1/2 Stanton St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 153 1/2 Stanton St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
My beautiful puppies rolled in something absolutely horrible the other night and I called nearby groomers desperately looking for help! Furry N' Fabulous answered right away and arranged to open three hours earlier first thing the next day than their usual business hours just so we could rush in! Two wonderful groomers and a staff member named Iris greeted us, and all the while someone else helped us arrange everything by phone and text. Having new puppies is scary and overwhelming, but it felt so wonderful to have such warm and kind support!

Most of all -- they did incredible work on our puppies! I am in love with their tidy and chic trims (still super natural looking, but so much cleaner), and the puppies smell great and look fantastic. And, I'm so relieved the puppies seemed like they had a great time, too! (Usually they are nervous at new places, so this is a big deal.)

Thank you SO much! We are customers forever, for sure

originalText.text: I have brought my baby boy here a couple times now and each time gets better and better!! They really take the time to listen to what I am asking for and they also take excellent care of my giant boy! They really take the time to get my doodles pesky hair feelings fresh and soft. They are also reasonably priced for how amazing they are, we are so lucky to have such a fantastic groomer only a couple blocks away.

text.text: I have brought my baby boy here a couple times now and each time gets better and better!! They really take the time to listen to what I am asking for and they also take excellent care of my giant boy! They really take the time to get my doodles pesky hair feelings fresh and soft. They are also reasonably priced for how amazing they are, we are so lucky to have such a fantastic groomer only a couple blocks away.

originalText.text: My pup was recently groomed here and I have to rate the experience 5 stars! My dog came out super happy, playing in the shop and giving the groomer kisses, etc. I could easily tell she was very well loved and taken care of during her session. I am so happy to have found this place and look forward to bringing my pup here from now on! If you are in search of a groomer please be sure to check this place out! Before the grooming even began the groomer herself came out to discuss my dog coat, asked for an idea or photo of what I wanted and even inspected to see if I was able to get what I wanted without any disappointments as they wanted to keep expectations realistic.

originalText.text: Great grooming experience for our kitty. It is so hard to find cat grooming in NYC sometimes so we were really pleased to learn about Furry N Fabulous! Our cat, Waffles, was treated with care, came home extra fluffy and with her nails fully trimmed. They even gave her the cute bandanna from the photo! Definitely recommend.

Our cat, Waffles, was treated with care, came home extra fluffy and with her nails fully trimmed. They even gave her the cute bandanna from the photo! Definitely recommend.

originalText.text: Really happy with the experience and so nice to have a reasonably priced grooming service in the neighborhood! Our dog was done in less than 2 hours and they took great care of her. The communication was amazing. I would highly recommend them and plan to go again.
